General.Name: EBEST Investment & Securities Co. Ltd
General.Description: EBEST Investment & Securities Co., Ltd. engages in the investment brokerage and trading businesses in South Korea. The company provides consignment and consignment-related credit services. It is also involved in the trading of securities and derivatives; acquisition/sale/arrangement of securities; asset securitization; project financing, etc. activities. The company was formerly known as E*TRADE Korea Co., Ltd. and changed its name to EBEST Investment & Securities Co., Ltd. in April 2015. EBEST Investment & Securities Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
